documentation.xlink:title: USGS Coastal and Marine Program Time Series Data

attribute.name: institution
attribute.value: U.S.Geological Survey, Woods Hole Coastal and Marine Science Center

attribute.name: publisher_name
attribute.value: USGS Coastal Marine Geology Program Sediment Transport group

attribute.name: project
attribute.value: USGS Coastal Marine Geology Program Sediment Transport group

attribute.name: title
attribute.value: 3151A-A1H.cdf - Currents and Sediment Transport in Western Massachusetts Bay

attribute.name: summary
attribute.value: A pilot winter-time experiment to investigate circulation and sediment transport. Designed to provide information to aid in citing the new ocean outfall for the Boston sewer system.
